name: Twitter Clone
desc: Developed a full-stack web application using the MERN stack and Enabled features of following/unfollow , deleting/liking/unliking posts .

name: E-commerce Website
desc: Full-Stack E-commerece website using mern with Admin Dashboard and Paytm Payment Gateway. MERN Stack tech, ready to use for business.

name: Amazon-Clone
desc: Amazon clone using HTML and CSS, replicating core layout components such as the header, search bar, product grid, and footer.

name: Spotify-Clone
desc: Full-Stack project dashboard which is collection of projects built on the React library.

name: Notes-App
desc: Notes application using the MERN stack, allowing users to register, log in, and securely create, edit, update, or delete personal notes.

name: ScoreKeeper-Game
desc: game using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, enabling players to track and update scores interactively with a clean and intuitive interface.
